title: F1 Shook Up Tradition by Adding Sprint Races
description: This season, there are just three of them — which determine the grid for the big event on Sunday — but drivers have mixed feelings about the format.
dc:creator: Ian Parkes
media:description: Charles Leclerc of Ferrari leading Max Verstappen of Red Bull and the rest of the field at the start during the sprint at the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix in April. The São Paulo Grand Prix will feature the third and final sprint of the season.
